resources.string: \t\t\t\tSms Tracker is mobile finding app which help you to find even if its offline by sending sms to the lost mobile.App can reply back to sender vai sms.
\u2022 Switch between silent, vibrate, ringing mode.\n\u2022 Send location to sender(Works only when location is ON)\n\u2022 Change Lock Screen wallpaper with helping message

Users have to set the command for each function and enable the switch by granting necessary permission. In case of phone lost, user can send SMS with the same command to the lost phone to active that function.
